Posts.Content: Hi destreza sorry to hear bout ur diagnosis, stay strong im a bc survivor i got my diagnosis last october stage 2 DCIS and invasive ductal carcinoma had 2 surgeries ,radiotherapy and im on tamoxifen for 5 yrs had my 1st year check mammogram this afternoon. Good luck and like the others hav said once u get ur pathology u will no more xxxxx
Posts.Title: recently diagnosed and I am so lost and scared

Posts.Content: Hi daisy10,i had Â stage 2 DCIS and INVASIVE DUCTAL CARCINOMA With the cancer in my LYMPHATIC VASCULAR SYSTEM,I recieved my pathology report that had all this information ,I am a 3yr survivor,my tumour was 1mm from my chest wall took 2 ops to remove it and 3 wks radiotherapy, iv found another lump in previous breast cancer site and have rib,hip and chest wall pain so goin for Isotope full bone scan on friday,Im still waiting on mammogram and sonogram to investigate new lump,ask either ur BCN or ONCOLOGIST about ur hazy lymphatic system diagnosis.Take care we are all breast cancer warrior sisters xxxxxx
Posts.Title: Lympho vascular invasion
